<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104222</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202711</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Graphing Quadratic Equations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphischee Darstellung Der Quadratischen 
Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphique des Équations Quadratiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Representando graficamente Equações 
Quadráticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresentare graficamente Le Equazioni 
Quadratiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δώσει με γραφική παράσταση τις δευτέρου βαθμού 
εξισώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Representación gráfica De Ecuaciones 
Gra'ficamente Cuadráticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will help students quickly graph a quadratic equation. It will also help them to understand the purpose of completing the square.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Lektionwille helfen Kursteilnehmern, 
schnell eine quadratische Gleichung graphisch darzustellen. Er 
hilft ihnen auch, den Zweck des Durchführens des Quadrats zu 
verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette volonté de leçon aident des étudiants 
rapidement à représenter graphiquement une équation quadratique. 
Elle les aidera également à comprendre le but de terminer la 
place.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta vontade da lição ajuda a estudantes 
rapidamente representar graficamente uma equação quadrática. 
Ajudar-lhes-á também compreender a finalidade de terminar o 
quadrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa volontà di lezione aiuta rapidamente gli 
allievi a rappresentare graficamente un'equazione quadratica. 
Egualmente lo aiuterà a capire lo scopo di completare il 
quadrato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα βοηθήσει τη γραφική παράσταση 
σπουδαστών γρήγορα μια δευτέρου βαθμού εξίσωση. Θα τους 
βοηθήσει επίσης για να καταλάβει το σκοπό το τετράγωνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta voluntad de la lección ayuda a estudiantes 
rápidamente a representar una ecuación gra'ficamente cuadrática. 
También les ayudará a entender el propósito de terminar el 
cuadrado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHY SCHADT
FN:KATHY SCHADT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

  </manifestation>
